revised_title: Carbon Dioxide Distribution in Hen's Eggs
tldr: The authors studied the distribution of carbon dioxide in hen's eggs and found that the bicarbonate content of egg-white increases with higher partial pressures of carbon dioxide. They also determined the solubility of carbon dioxide in egg-white and discussed the buffering capacity of egg-white. This research provides insights into the composition and properties of egg-white, which can be useful for understanding egg biology and food science.
